system.availability: A Torch Like Object, emits pitch blackness that blocks out the wavelengths of light humans can see. Anyone under the effects of the emission (such as through "shining" it on them) suffer -40 to all vision-based Perception Tests.
system.cost: A Rare Archeotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)
